name: Slow Cooker Mashed Potatoes
author: BWAYE
summary: These are melt in your mouth mashed potatoes, and what could be better than potatoes in the slow cooker?
ingredients: 5 pounds red potatoes, cut into chunks
1 tablespoon minced garlic, or to taste
directions: In a large pot of lightly salted boiling water, cook the potatoes, garlic, and bouillon until potatoes are tender but firm, about 15 minutes
In a bowl, mash potatoes with sour cream and cream cheese, adding reserved water as needed to attain desired consistency
Transfer the potato mixture to a slow cooker, cover,  and cook on Low for 2 to 3 hours
Just before serving, stir in butter and season with salt and pepper to taste
